About Deep-fried

Deep-fried is a minimalist Jekyll theme optimized for readability and performance. Compatible with GitHub Pages, Deep-fried was created by Steven McLintock and is named after “Scotland’s craziest takeaway”, the delicious and ridiculously unhealthy Deep-fried Mars bar.

To find out more, please visit github.com/kiltandcode/deep-fried.
